item.title: Coding Faster with dotNetTips Spargine: Validating Data Made Easy with Validator
item.description: The article emphasizes the critical importance of data validation in software engineering. By adopting these techniques, developers can improve code safety and maintainability. item.title: Avoid Build Breaks: Fixing SDK Conflicts Between Visual Studio and Preview Versions
item.description: When using both Visual Studio and Visual Studio Preview, the dotnet CLI may unintentionally select the latest SDK, causing build failures. This article will show you how to fix this issue. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2025/05/23/avoid-build-breaks-fixing-sdk-conflicts-between-visual-studio-and-preview-versions/
